text: Baran Süzer is a Turkish businessperson and present vice chairman of Suzer group that owns The Ritz-Carlton hotel chain in Turkey. Süzer is also a member of Board of Trustees for Süzer Foundation. In 2009, he was elected as the “Best Second Generation Businessman” and in 2011 he was included in the list of the “25 Most Successful Businessmen Under 35” of Forbes Turkey. == References == Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Living people Category:Turkish businesspeople
title: Baran Süzer
